page.title: 05ADULT'S DAY IN HOLMER GREEN
page.content: Mum's alarm goes off about 7am.Dad has already gone to work.Mum then wakes the family.We then go downstairs for breakfast.Mum makes sandwiches for our packed lunches.After tidying the kitchen,mum takes my sister and brother to school usually by car,as mum has to hurry back to the village centre to prepare for playgroup at 9.15.The morning is spent at playgroup and mum gets home about 12.30.After lunch she sometimes helps in the first or middle school library for the afternoon or does housework or shopping.Mum collects the little ones from school at 3.15 and comes home to prepare dinner and gets ready for gym,dancing and other activities.Dad comes in for his meal at about 6.30.During the evening mum usually sews,does ironing and reads until bedtime.
